member.name: ID2D1TransformGraph.AddNode
member.summary: Adds the provided node to the transform graph.
member.param: The node that will be added to the transform graph.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: Direct2D could not allocate sufficient memory to complete the call.

member.name: ID2D1TransformGraph.Clear
member.summary: Clears the transform nodes and all connections from the transform graph.

member.name: ID2D1TransformGraph.ConnectNode
member.summary: Connects two nodes inside the transform graph.
member.param: The node from which the connection will be made.
The node to which the connection will be made.
The node input that will be connected.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: Direct2D could not locate the specified node.

member.name: ID2D1TransformGraph.ConnectToEffectInput
member.summary: Connects a transform node inside the graph to the corresponding effect input of the encapsulating effect.
member.param: The effect input to which the transform node will be bound.
The node to which the connection will be made.
The node input that will be connected.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: Direct2D could not locate the specified node.

member.name: ID2D1TransformGraph.GetInputCount
member.summary: Returns the number of inputs to the transform graph.
member.returns: The number of inputs to this transform graph.

member.name: ID2D1TransformGraph.RemoveNode
member.summary: Removes the provided node from the transform graph.
member.param: The node that will be removed from the transform graph.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: Direct2D could not locate the specified node.

member.name: ID2D1TransformGraph.SetOutputNode
member.summary: Sets the output node for the transform graph.
member.param: The node that will be considered the output of the transform node.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: Direct2D could not locate the specified node.

member.name: ID2D1TransformGraph.SetPassthroughGraph
member.summary: Uses the specified input as the effect output.
member.param: The index of the input to the effect.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: Direct2D could not locate the specified node.

member.name: ID2D1TransformGraph.SetSingleTransformNode
member.summary: Sets a single transform node as being equivalent to the whole graph.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: Direct2D could not allocate sufficient memory to complete the call.

member.name: ID2D1TransformGraph
member.summary: Represents a graph of transform nodes.
